page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: The school was built in 1861. In the front playground above the middle window there is a crest.The crest represents the Huyshe family.At one time there was a stove near the main door but it isn't there anymore.The school is made of stone from Kilerton quarry.The scool has had one fire,that was caused by the stove.When that happened people came running from far around to put the fire out.There has been 1330 children at the school from William Ambrey to Graham Prigg.William Ambrey came to this school on 20.11.1890.
